translations: [气象]布冷风（中亚、西伯利亚的）

sentences.sentence: Every USSR citizen was proud of the country's space exploration program. One of the top Soviet spaceships, called "Buran", could deliver weapons of mass destruction to the orbit.
sentences.translation: 每一个苏联的公民都曾为他们国家的空间探索计划而骄傲。其中一艘苏联最顶尖的叫“布兰”的航天飞船能够运送大规模杀伤性武器到既定的轨道上。
